Subject: Re: Integer Neural Write-up
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=128796230
X-Yahoo-Profile: kalmantech

You guys have really done an excellent job.  I never expected a 
potential integer based neural approach to be developed - let alone 
tested - when I raised the double vs single float question.

What code base would you recommend starting with to performance 
profile a NEAT engine on a Blackfin?  Note the Blackfin supports a 32 
bit multiply instruction but no divide.  The 32 bit mulitply is a 
multi-clock instruction.  Preliminary testing yields little 
difference in timing between 16 bit and 32 bit multiples for simple 
operations.

Steve
